column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=How West dealt with his father 's abuse
#Text=You said your father was a victim of abuse himself and that pattern often repeats .
#Text=How did you stop that pattern ?
#Text=Was it through your voice work ?
#Text=No , not really .
#Text=I had a mean streak .
#Text=But I ’m such a dyed-in-the-wool animal lover .
#Text=I ’ve always had pets .
#Text=I would be so filled with anger and rage that on my way to school , it was literally a “ kick at the cat ” as they used to say .
#Text=You ’re angry and you do n’t know where to direct it .
#Text=You ’ll kick a wall that has wet paint on it .
#Text=That ’ll teach them .
#Text=And hurt yourself doing it .
#Text=I ’d go out and kick the shit out of some little cat or something , just like you know , smack it .
#Text=You know , go over and go to pet it , then whack it because that ’s all I knew .
#Text=In a weird way , in a weird permutation of the whole situation , to me that was supposed to be love .
#Text=Cause why would your parent hit you , hurt you ?
#Text=Why ?
#Text=It never makes sense to a kid .
#Text=And they all used to say , “ It ’s because I care about you . ”
#Text=But I got over that stuff and what I did was start to hurt myself .
#Text=How so ?
#Text=I started drinking and doing drugs when I was about 21 .
#Text=I was playing in a band and it was all part of the picture , you know .
#Text=It could be rosy for you .
#Text=You could n’t survive anywhere else , but in a band you were like golden .
#Text=I used to punch walls , cause ruckuses and get into fights wherever I went .
#Text=You know , throw things at people .
#Text=Rehabilitation and sobriety
#Text=How did you stop the fights and the drugs ?
#Text=I had to go to rehab .
#Text=I had a job in radio .
#Text=I stopped playing music .
#Text=I tried to do some standup comedy , but I do n’t have the discipline for it .
#Text=I used to just go out there and not care if I died or lived or whatever .
#Text=You know , I ’d just say stuff .
#Text=I was always searching .
#Text=I just could n’t go up there and do twelve minutes and pretend like I ’d just thought of it , you know , for three years .
#Text=Are you still sober ?
#Text=Oh yeah .
#Text=I ’ve been sober for 22 years .
#Text=But I had to go into rehab .
#Text=I had a series of car accidents .
#Text=I almost got killed one night but I just walked away from it chuckling , smashed .
#Text=I got away with this kind of behavior and it was awful because I was terrorizing people .
#Text=Not during the day .
#Text=At night .
#Text=And stories .
#Text=There would always be stories and then it would make the papers .
